channel.title: Staffs on New Directions Publishers
channel.description: Recent content in Staffs on New Directions Publishers

item.title: Barbara Epler
item.description: joined New Directions as an editorial assistant after graduating from college in 1984. She became editor in chief in 1995; named Publisher in 2008, and in 2011 became president.

item.title: Brittany Dennison
item.description: is co-director of publicity. She hails from St. Louis and Seattle.

item.title: Chris Wait
item.description: is permissions editor and Ebook manager at New Directions. After graduating from Vassar College, he lived in Argentina, Japan, Mexico and Turkey before settling in New York.

item.title: Declan Spring
item.description: is vice president, senior editor, and director of foreign rights. He has been working at New Directions since 1991.

item.title: Erik Rieselbach
item.description: is the art director and production manager of New Directions.

item.title: Jeff Clapper
item.description: has been working for New Directions for twenty years as our business manager and computer consultant extraordinaire.

item.title: Jeffrey Yang
item.description: works as an editor at New Directions. He has been with the press since 2000.

item.title: Mieke Chew
item.description: is co-director of publicity. She grew up in Australia, where she founded Higher Arc magazine in 2011.

item.title: Tynan Kogane
item.description: is an editor at New Directions. He was raised in Seattle and graduated from the New School.
